courses.name: Fundamentals of Learning: Essentials for a Successful University Experience
courses.desc:
This course focuses on skills essential for a successful university experience. The course covers topics such as time management, reading skills, note taking, study and exam techniques, essay writing, library research skills, and personal issues such as self-esteem, managing emotions and confidence. The course evaluation will be pass/fail only.
 Note: This course is not open to all students; enrolment is restricted.
